# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other drill found) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0) 

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt structure at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
- Ensure that the burner equipment has fuel before using it.
- Burner mining drills and burners require fuel to operate.

### Errors when using equipment without ingredients
- Ensure that the equipment has the necessary ingredients before using it.
- Stone furnaces require ingredients to smelt.

### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before using it.
- Steam engines require a connection to a power network to operate.

### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that the pipe group has fluid before using it.
- Pipe groups require fluid to operate.

### Errors when using electricity groups without connection
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before using it.
- Electricity groups require a connection to an electric network to operate.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
